AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: enslaved Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured and turned into a slave. [PAWN_pronoun] was subjected to genetic implantation of a slave xenotype, to forever chain [PAWN_objective] to be a slave with no hope of escaping this fate.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: imprisoned Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] resisted to the end against [PAWN_possessive] captives, ultimately ending up being implanted with a slave xenotype. [PAWN_pronoun] felt like [PAWN_possessive] mind is eternally imprisoned to observe in horror as [PAWN_objective] body no longer listens to any attempts to resist or escape from being a slave, no matter how hard [PAWN_pronoun] tried.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: criminal Oni slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was convicted of a heinous crime and sentenced to the maximum extent of the law, short of execution. This ended up with [PAWN_objective] being implanted with a slave xenotype as part of the punishment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: domesticated Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as slave like [PAWN_possessive] parents and holds no ambitions in life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: domesticated Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as slave like [PAWN_possessive] parents, forced to work tirelessly and follow the same route in life as them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: domesticated Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as slave like [PAWN_possessive] parents, in a highly abusive environment. With being so far genetically chained to be a slave on top of this, [PAWN_possessive] mind have broken down into accepting this as the norm.
